author: Ben Zimmer
title: ‘Volatile’ Birds, People—and Stock Markets
text:
The wild swings in the stock market in recent days, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average and other stock indexes sharply declining on Friday and Monday before rallying and then tumbling again on Thursday, have left investors reeling—and searching for the right metaphor.
It has been a “roller-coaster ride.” Stock prices have been “seesawing.” The markets are experiencing “whiplash.” Or has it been a “whipsaw”?
Whatever...
